source:
#create dataframe for the publicdispatchsegment orv table
publicdispatchsegment = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Onroute/publicdispatchsegment.parquet', format='parquet')
publicdispatchsegment.createOrReplaceTempView("publicdispatchsegment")

#create dataframe for the publicorvuser orv table
publicorvuser = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Onroute/publicorvuser.parquet', format='parquet')
publicorvuser.createOrReplaceTempView("publicorvuser")

#create dataframe for the publicvehicle orv table
publicvehicle = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Onroute/publicvehicle.parquet', format='parquet')
publicvehicle.createOrReplaceTempView("publicvehicle")

#create dataframe for the publicdepot orv table
publicdepot = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Onroute/publicdepo.parquet', format='parquet')
publicdepot.createOrReplaceTempView("publicdepot")

#create dataframe for the publiccustomer orv table
publiccustomer = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Onroute/publiccustomer.parquet', format='parquet')
publiccustomer.createOrReplaceTempView("publiccustomer")

#create dataframe for the dbocustomer lms table
dbocustomer = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbocustomer.parquet', format='parquet')
dbocustomer.createOrReplaceTempView("dbocustomer")

#create dataframe for the dbozone lms table
dbozone = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbozone.parquet', format='parquet')
dbozone.createOrReplaceTempView("dbozone")

#create dataframe for the dbosroute lms table
dbosroute = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbosroute.parquet', format='parquet')
dbosroute.createOrReplaceTempView("dbosroute")

#create dataframe for the dbobillzoneroute lms table
dbobillzoneroute = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbobill_zoneroute.parquet', format='parquet')
dbobillzoneroute.createOrReplaceTempView("dbobillzoneroute")

#create dataframe for the dbobillzone lms table
dbobillzone = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbobill_zone.parquet', format='parquet')
dbobillzone.createOrReplaceTempView("dbobillzone")

#create dataframe for the dbobillbillcustomersr  lms table
dbobillbillcustomersr = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbobill_billcustomersr.parquet', format='parquet')
dbobillbillcustomersr.createOrReplaceTempView("dbobillbillcustomersr")

#create dataframe for the dbobillcustomergroups  lms table
dbobillcustomergroups  = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbobill_customergroups.parquet', format='parquet')
dbobillcustomergroups.createOrReplaceTempView("dbobillcustomergroups")

#create dataframe for the dbobillcustomergrouptypes  lms table
dbobillcustomergrouptypes  = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbobill_customergrouptypes.parquet', format='parquet')
dbobillcustomergrouptypes.createOrReplaceTempView("dbobillcustomergrouptypes")

#create dataframe for the dbolocation  lms table
dbolocation  = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbolocation.parquet', format='parquet')
dbolocation.createOrReplaceTempView("dbolocation")

#Create DataFrame for the dbodepot LMS Table
dbodepot = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/dbodepot.parquet', format='parquet')
dbodepot.createOrReplaceTempView("dbodepot")

#Create DataFrame for the dbovehicle LMS Table
dbovehicle = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbovehicle.parquet', format='parquet')
dbovehicle.createOrReplaceTempView("dbovehicle")

#Create DataFrame for the dbodb_reasongroup LMS Table
dbodb_reasongroup = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbodb_reasongroup.parquet', format='parquet')
dbodb_reasongroup.createOrReplaceTempView("dbodb_reasongroup")

#Create DataFrame for the dbodb_inservicereason LMS Table
dbodb_inservicereason = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbodb_inservicereason.parquet', format='parquet')
dbodb_inservicereason.createOrReplaceTempView("dbodb_inservicereason")

#create dataframe for the publicpod orv table
publicpod = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Onroute/publicpod.parquet', format='parquet')
publicpod.createOrReplaceTempView("publicpod")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stpod
AS
SELECT
    p.id as orv_pod_id
    ,p.did as orv_pod_did
	,p.name as orv_pod_name
	,to_timestamp(p.poddate) as orv_pod_poddate
	,p.lat as orv_pod_lat
	,p.lng as orv_pod_lng
	,p.customerrating as orv_pod_customerrating
	,p.customerfeedback as orv_pod_customerfeedback
FROM publicpod p

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stinservicereasons
AS
SELECT 
    isr.ID as lms_inservicereason_id
	,isr.ReasonGroupID as lms_inservicereason_reasongroupid
	,rg.Description as lms_reasongroup_description
    ,isr.Reason as lms_inservicereason_reason
    ,isr.Valid as lms_inservicereason_valid
FROM dbodb_inservicereason isr
LEFT JOIN dbodb_reasongroup rg on rg.id = isr.ReasonGroupID;

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stdispatchsegment
AS
SELECT 

    d.id as orv_dispatchsegment_id
    ,d.fromdelid as orv_dispatchsegment_fromdelid
    ,d.todelid as orv_dispatchsegment_todelid
    ,d.distance as orv_dispatchsegment_distance
    ,d.duration as orv_dispatchsegment_duration
    ,d.encodedpolyline as orv_dispatchsegment_encodedpolyline
    ,d.did as orv_dispatchsegment_did
    ,d.tollcost as orv_dispatchsegment_tollcost
    ,d.fuelcost as orv_dispatchsegment_fuelcost
    ,d.inscost as orv_dispatchsegment_inscost
    ,d.labourcost as orv_dispatchsegment_labourcost
    ,d.maintcost as orv_dispatchsegment_maintcost
    ,d.cpicost as orv_dispatchsegment_cpicost
    ,d.vehicleclass as orv_dispatchsegment_vehicleclass
    ,d.fromlat as orv_dispatchsegment_fromlat
    ,d.fromlng as orv_dispatchsegment_fromlng
    ,d.tolat as orv_dispatchsegment_tolat
    ,d.tolng as orv_dispatchsegment_tolng
    ,to_timestamp(d.departuredate) as orv_dispatchsegment_departuredate
    ,to_timestamp(d.arrivaldate) as orv_dispatchsegment_arrivaldate
    ,to_timestamp(d.debriefeddate) as orv_dispatchsegment_debriefeddate
    ,d.optimized as orv_dispatchsegment_optimized
    ,d.segmentorder as orv_dispatchsegment_segmentorder
    ,d.customized as orv_dispatchsegment_customized
    ,d.parcelct as orv_dispatchsegment_parcelct

FROM publicdispatchsegment d

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
storvuser
AS
SELECT 
    o.id as orv_orvuser_id
    ,o.username as orv_orvuser_username
    ,o.fname as orv_orvuser_fname
    ,o.lname as orv_orvuser_lname
    ,o.empcode as orv_orvuser_empcode
    ,o.aka as orv_orvuser_aka
    ,o.gender as orv_orvuser_gender
    ,o.rsaid as orv_orvuser_rsaid
    ,o.passportno as orv_orvuser_passportno
    ,o.idpassportno as orv_orvuser_idpassportno
    ,o.nationality as orv_orvuser_nationality
    ,to_timestamp(o.termindate) as orv_orvuser_termindate
    ,o.status as orv_orvuser_status
    ,o.depot as orv_orvuser_depot
    ,o.jobcategory as orv_orvuser_jobcategory
    ,o.lmsid as orv_orvuser_lmsid
    ,o.vipid as orv_orvuser_vipid
    ,o.crewlmsid as orv_orvuser_crewlmsid
    ,o.courierid as orv_orvuser_courierid

    FROM publicorvuser o

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stvehicle
AS
SELECT 
    v.id as lms_vehicle_id
    ,v.FleetNo as lms_vehicle_fleetno
    ,v.RegNo as lms_vehicle_regno
    ,v.UID as lms_vehicle_uid
    ,v2.id as orv_vehicle_id
    ,v2.tollclass as orv_vehicle_tollclass
    ,v2.sapcode as orv_vehicle_sapcode
    ,v2.lmsid as orv_vehicle_lmsid

FROM dbovehicle v
LEFT JOIN publicvehicle v2 on v2.lmsid = v.id

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stdepotorv
AS
SELECT 
    d.id as orv_depot_id
    ,d.name as orv_depot_name
    ,d.depcode as orv_depot_depcode
    ,d.address as orv_depot_address
    ,d.suburb as orv_depot_suburb
    ,d.city as orv_depot_city
    ,d.zipcode as orv_depot_zipcode
    ,d.region as orv_depot_region
    ,d.lat as orv_depot_lat
    ,d.lng as orv_depot_lng
    ,d.placeid as orv_depot_placeid
    ,d.w3w as orv_depot_w3w
    ,to_timestamp(d.insdate) as orv_depot_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(d.update) as orv_depot_update
    ,d.lmsid as orv_depot_lmsid
    ,d.country as orv_depot_country
    ,d.status as orv_depot_status

FROM publicdepot d

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stdepot
AS
SELECT 

    d.id as md_depot_id
    ,d.itemlabel as md_depot_itemlabel
    ,d.itemvalue as md_depot_itemvalue
    ,d.depotname as md_depot_depotname
    ,d.parentdepotcode as md_depot_parentdepotcode
    ,d.division as md_depot_division
    ,d.address as md_depot_address
    ,d.latitude as md_depot_latitude
    ,d.longitude as md_depot_longitude
    ,d.sapdepreciationaccountcode as md_depot_sapdepreciationaccountcode
    ,d.mfrauthoriser as md_depot_mfrauthoriser
    ,d.mfrapplicationflag as md_depot_mfrapplicationflag
    ,d.activeflag as md_depot_activeflag
    ,d.operationsmanager as md_depot_operationsmanager
    ,d.branchmanager as md_depot_branchmanager
    ,d.fleetmanager as md_depot_fleetmanager


FROM dbodepot d

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stbillcustomer 
AS
SELECT 
    lc.id as lms_customer_id
    ,lc.ActiveFlag as lms_customer_activeflag
    ,lc.Adres1 as lms_customer_adres1
    ,lc.Adres2 as lms_customer_adres2
    ,lc.Appointment as lms_customer_appointment
    ,lc.AreaDesc as lms_customer_areadesc
    ,lc.AutoEmailFlag as lms_customer_autoemailflag
    ,lc.Bill_RouteID as lms_customer_bill_routeid
    ,lc.Bill_ServiceTypeID as lms_customer_bill_servicetypeid
    ,lc.Bill_ZoneRouteID as lms_customer_bill_zonerouteid
    ,lc.brouteid as lms_customer_brouteid
    ,lc.BType as lms_customer_btype
    ,lc.ccDepot as lms_customer_ccdepot
    ,lc.ccRoute as lms_customer_ccroute
    ,lc.ChainStoreFlag as lms_customer_chainstoreflag
    ,lc.CONSPerORD as lms_customer_consperord
    ,lc.ContactPerson as lms_customer_contactperson
    ,lc.CountryCode as lms_customer_countrycode
    ,lc.CRef as lms_customer_cref
    ,lc.CREF2 as lms_customer_cref2
    ,lc.CRouteID as lms_customer_crouteid
    ,lc.CType as lms_customer_ctype
    ,lc.CustAccID as lms_customer_custaccid
    ,lc.CustGroupID as lms_customer_custgroupid
    ,lc.CustMainID as lms_customer_custmainid
    ,lc.CustRateid as lms_customer_custrateid
    ,lc.CustRouteGroupID as lms_customer_custroutegroupid
    ,lc.CustServiceDays as lms_customer_custservicedays
    ,lc.CustServiceTime as lms_customer_custservicetime
    ,lc.DC as lms_customer_dc
    ,lc.DefDelPCode as lms_customer_defdelpcode
    ,lc.DeliveryDepotID as lms_customer_deliverydepotid
    ,lc.DeliveryType as lms_customer_deliverytype
    ,lc.DestinationLocationCode as lms_customer_destinationlocationcode
    ,lc.DualBillCourier as lms_customer_dualbillcourier
    ,lc.Email as lms_customer_email
    ,lc.FaxNo as lms_customer_faxno
    ,lc.FCType as lms_customer_fctype
    ,lc.FLevy as lms_customer_flevy
    ,lc.InCompleteOrderChkFlag as lms_customer_incompleteorderchkflag
    ,lc.InsertDate as lms_customer_insertdate
    ,lc.IsBillTo as lms_customer_isbillto
    ,lc.isBooking as lms_customer_isbooking
    ,lc.isHighVolume as lms_customer_ishighvolume
    ,lc.IsManual as lms_customer_ismanual
    ,lc.LastUpdate as lms_customer_lastupdate
    ,lc.LocationTypeCode as lms_customer_locationtypecode
    ,lc.MaxCartons as lms_customer_maxcartons
    ,lc.Name as lms_customer_name
    ,lc.NDDID as lms_customer_nddid
    ,lc.OnHoldID as lms_customer_onholdid
    ,lc.PCode as lms_customer_pcode
    ,lc.PCodeID as lms_customer_pcodeid
    ,lc.ServRouteID as lms_customer_servrouteid
    ,lc.SRouteID as lms_customer_srouteid
    ,lc.StoreID as lms_customer_storeid
    ,lc.Suburb as lms_customer_suburb
    ,lc.TelNo as lms_customer_telno
    ,lc.Town as lms_customer_town
    ,lc.VolFact as lms_customer_volfact
    ,lc.WType as lms_customer_wtype
    ,oc.id as orv_customer_id
    ,oc.name as orv_customer_name
    ,oc.contact as orv_customer_contact
    ,oc.email as orv_customer_email
    ,oc.mobileno as orv_customer_mobileno
    ,oc.landline as orv_customer_landline
    ,oc.ctype as orv_customer_ctype
    ,oc.parent as orv_customer_parent
    ,to_timestamp(oc.lastupdate) as orv_customer_lastupdate
    ,oc.lmsid as orv_customer_lmsid
    ,oc.srouteid as orv_customer_srouteid
    ,oc.verified as orv_customer_verified
    ,oc.defaultmaildomain as orv_customer_defaultmaildomain
    ,oc.autoassignticketid as orv_customer_autoassignticketid
    ,oc.sendinfodel as orv_customer_sendinfodel
    ,oc.anonemailcustsupportemail as orv_customer_anonemailcustsupportemail
    ,oc.anonemailcustsupporttel as orv_customer_anonemailcustsupporttel
    ,oc.cref as orv_customer_cref
    ,oc.division as orv_customer_division
    ,oc.ecomm as orv_customer_ecomm
    ,oc.preverifiedaddid as orv_customer_preverifiedaddid
    ,oc.mallname as orv_customer_mallname
    ,oc.mallid as orv_customer_mallid
    ,oc.mallflag as orv_customer_mallflag
    ,oc.malllmsid as orv_customer_malllmsid
    ,oc.highvolume as orv_customer_highvolume
    ,oc.custreference as orv_customer_custreference
    ,oc.unverdate as orv_customer_unverdate
    ,oc.verdate as orv_customer_verdate
    ,oc.groupid as orv_customer_groupid
    ,oc.postalcodecustgroupid as orv_customer_postalcodecustgroupid
    ,oc.webhookauthcredential as orv_customer_webhookauthcredential
    ,oc.mergedinto as orv_customer_mergedinto
    ,oc.cusmergedate as orv_customer_cusmergedate
    ,oc.customerref as orv_customer_customerref
    ,oc.routemaint as orv_customer_routemaint
    ,bcr.id as lms_customer_billcustid
    ,bcr.billcustid as lms_customer_billcustbillcustid
    ,bcr.incovalue as lms_customer_billcustincovalue
    ,bcr.daterangelimit as lms_customer_billcustdaterangelimit
    ,bcr.status as lms_customer_billcuststatus
    ,bcr.note as lms_customer_billcustnote
    ,bcr.custgroupid as lms_customer_billcustcustgroupid
    ,bcr.activeflag as lms_customer_billcustactiveflag
    ,bcr.routerateeffectivedate as lms_customer_billcustrouterateeffectivedate
    ,bcr.ratesaddedflag as lms_customer_billcustratesaddedflag
    ,bcr.ibtratesflag as lms_customer_billcustibtratesflag
    ,bcr.slidingscaleflag as lms_customer_billcustslidingscaleflag
    ,bcr.sapflag as lms_customer_billcustsapflag
    ,bcr.sapcode as lms_customer_billcustsapcode
    ,bcr.sapcustname as lms_customer_billcustsapcustname
    ,bcr.averagepclrateflag as lms_customer_billcustaveragepclrateflag
    ,bcr.averagepclkg as lms_customer_billcustaveragepclkg
    ,bcr.billdatestart as lms_customer_billcustbilldatestart
    ,bcr.itemcode as lms_customer_billcustitemcode
    ,bcr.servicetypeflag as lms_customer_billcustservicetypeflag
    ,bcr.returnreverserateflag as lms_customer_billcustreturnreverserateflag
    ,bcr.minnoofpcls as lms_customer_billcustminnoofpcls
    ,bcr.productcategoryid as lms_customer_billcustproductcategoryid
    ,bcr.samedayconsolidation as lms_customer_billcustsamedayconsolidation
    ,bcr.rategroupid as lms_customer_billcustrategroupid
    ,bcr.risksurchargeflag as lms_customer_billcustrisksurchargeflag
    ,bcr.applyavgvolweight as lms_customer_billcustapplyavgvolweight
    ,bcr.avgvolweight as lms_customer_billcustavgvolweight
    ,bcr.ecommcustomerflag as lms_customer_billcustecommcustomerflag
    ,bcr.leadtimestructureid as lms_customer_billcustleadtimestructureid
    ,bcr.recalcinprogress as lms_customer_billcustrecalcinprogress
    ,bcr.recalcuserid as lms_customer_billcustrecalcuserid
    ,bcr.needwebhook as lms_customer_billcustneedwebhook
    ,bcr.routemaint as lms_customer_billcustroutemaint
    ,bcr.lhdistrflag as lms_customer_billcustlhdistrflag
    ,bcg.id as lms_customer_billcustgroupid
    ,bcg.description as lms_customer_billcustgroupdescription
    ,bcg.grouptypeid as lms_customer_billcustgroupgrouptypeid
    ,bcgt.id as lms_customer_billcustgrouptypeid
    ,bcgt.description as lms_customer_billcustgrouptypedescription




FROM dbocustomer lc
LEFT JOIN publiccustomer oc on oc.lmsid = lc.id
LEFT JOIN dbobillbillcustomersr bcr on bcr.billcustid = lc.id 
LEFT JOIN dbobillcustomergroups bcg  on bcg.id = bcr.custgroupid
LEFT JOIN dbobillcustomergrouptypes bcgt on bcgt.id = bcg.grouptypeid

WHERE lc.isbillto = 1

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stdeliverypickupcustomer 
AS
SELECT 
    lc.id as lms_customer_id
    ,lc.ActiveFlag as lms_customer_activeflag
    ,lc.Adres1 as lms_customer_adres1
    ,lc.Adres2 as lms_customer_adres2
    ,lc.Appointment as lms_customer_appointment
    ,lc.AreaDesc as lms_customer_areadesc
    ,lc.AutoEmailFlag as lms_customer_autoemailflag
    ,lc.Bill_RouteID as lms_customer_bill_routeid
    ,lc.Bill_ServiceTypeID as lms_customer_bill_servicetypeid
    ,lc.Bill_ZoneRouteID as lms_customer_bill_zonerouteid
    ,lc.brouteid as lms_customer_brouteid
    ,lc.BType as lms_customer_btype
    ,lc.ccDepot as lms_customer_ccdepot
    ,lc.ccRoute as lms_customer_ccroute
    ,lc.ChainStoreFlag as lms_customer_chainstoreflag
    ,lc.CONSPerORD as lms_customer_consperord
    ,lc.ContactPerson as lms_customer_contactperson
    ,lc.CountryCode as lms_customer_countrycode
    ,lc.CRef as lms_customer_cref
    ,lc.CREF2 as lms_customer_cref2
    ,lc.CRouteID as lms_customer_crouteid
    ,lc.CType as lms_customer_ctype
    ,lc.CustAccID as lms_customer_custaccid
    ,lc.CustGroupID as lms_customer_custgroupid
    ,lc.CustMainID as lms_customer_custmainid
    ,lc.CustRateid as lms_customer_custrateid
    ,lc.CustRouteGroupID as lms_customer_custroutegroupid
    ,lc.CustServiceDays as lms_customer_custservicedays
    ,lc.CustServiceTime as lms_customer_custservicetime
    ,lc.DC as lms_customer_dc
    ,lc.DefDelPCode as lms_customer_defdelpcode
    ,lc.DeliveryDepotID as lms_customer_deliverydepotid
    ,lc.DeliveryType as lms_customer_deliverytype
    ,lc.DestinationLocationCode as lms_customer_destinationlocationcode
    ,lc.DualBillCourier as lms_customer_dualbillcourier
    ,lc.Email as lms_customer_email
    ,lc.FaxNo as lms_customer_faxno
    ,lc.FCType as lms_customer_fctype
    ,lc.FLevy as lms_customer_flevy
    ,lc.InCompleteOrderChkFlag as lms_customer_incompleteorderchkflag
    ,lc.InsertDate as lms_customer_insertdate
    ,lc.IsBillTo as lms_customer_isbillto
    ,lc.isBooking as lms_customer_isbooking
    ,lc.isHighVolume as lms_customer_ishighvolume
    ,lc.IsManual as lms_customer_ismanual
    ,lc.LastUpdate as lms_customer_lastupdate
    ,lc.LocationTypeCode as lms_customer_locationtypecode
    ,lc.MaxCartons as lms_customer_maxcartons
    ,lc.Name as lms_customer_name
    ,lc.NDDID as lms_customer_nddid
    ,lc.OnHoldID as lms_customer_onholdid
    ,lc.PCode as lms_customer_pcode
    ,lc.PCodeID as lms_customer_pcodeid
    ,lc.ServRouteID as lms_customer_servrouteid
    ,lc.SRouteID as lms_customer_srouteid
    ,lc.StoreID as lms_customer_storeid
    ,lc.Suburb as lms_customer_suburb
    ,lc.TelNo as lms_customer_telno
    ,lc.Town as lms_customer_town
    ,lc.VolFact as lms_customer_volfact
    ,lc.WType as lms_customer_wtype
    ,oc.id as orv_customer_id
    ,oc.name as orv_customer_name
    ,oc.contact as orv_customer_contact
    ,oc.email as orv_customer_email
    ,oc.mobileno as orv_customer_mobileno
    ,oc.landline as orv_customer_landline
    ,oc.ctype as orv_customer_ctype
    ,oc.parent as orv_customer_parent
    ,to_timestamp(oc.lastupdate) as orv_customer_lastupdate
    ,oc.lmsid as orv_customer_lmsid
    ,oc.srouteid as orv_customer_srouteid
    ,oc.verified as orv_customer_verified
    ,oc.defaultmaildomain as orv_customer_defaultmaildomain
    ,oc.autoassignticketid as orv_customer_autoassignticketid
    ,oc.sendinfodel as orv_customer_sendinfodel
    ,oc.anonemailcustsupportemail as orv_customer_anonemailcustsupportemail
    ,oc.anonemailcustsupporttel as orv_customer_anonemailcustsupporttel
    ,oc.cref as orv_customer_cref
    ,oc.division as orv_customer_division
    ,oc.ecomm as orv_customer_ecomm
    ,oc.preverifiedaddid as orv_customer_preverifiedaddid
    ,oc.mallname as orv_customer_mallname
    ,oc.mallid as orv_customer_mallid
    ,oc.mallflag as orv_customer_mallflag
    ,oc.malllmsid as orv_customer_malllmsid
    ,oc.highvolume as orv_customer_highvolume
    ,oc.custreference as orv_customer_custreference
    ,oc.unverdate as orv_customer_unverdate
    ,oc.verdate as orv_customer_verdate
    ,oc.groupid as orv_customer_groupid
    ,oc.postalcodecustgroupid as orv_customer_postalcodecustgroupid
    ,oc.webhookauthcredential as orv_customer_webhookauthcredential
    ,oc.mergedinto as orv_customer_mergedinto
    ,oc.cusmergedate as orv_customer_cusmergedate
    ,oc.customerref as orv_customer_customerref
    ,oc.routemaint as orv_customer_routemaint
    ,bcr.id as lms_customer_billcustid
    ,bcr.billcustid as lms_customer_billcustbillcustid
    ,bcr.incovalue as lms_customer_billcustincovalue
    ,bcr.daterangelimit as lms_customer_billcustdaterangelimit
    ,bcr.status as lms_customer_billcuststatus
    ,bcr.note as lms_customer_billcustnote
    ,bcr.custgroupid as lms_customer_billcustcustgroupid
    ,bcr.activeflag as lms_customer_billcustactiveflag
    ,bcr.routerateeffectivedate as lms_customer_billcustrouterateeffectivedate
    ,bcr.ratesaddedflag as lms_customer_billcustratesaddedflag
    ,bcr.ibtratesflag as lms_customer_billcustibtratesflag
    ,bcr.slidingscaleflag as lms_customer_billcustslidingscaleflag
    ,bcr.sapflag as lms_customer_billcustsapflag
    ,bcr.sapcode as lms_customer_billcustsapcode
    ,bcr.sapcustname as lms_customer_billcustsapcustname
    ,bcr.averagepclrateflag as lms_customer_billcustaveragepclrateflag
    ,bcr.averagepclkg as lms_customer_billcustaveragepclkg
    ,bcr.billdatestart as lms_customer_billcustbilldatestart
    ,bcr.itemcode as lms_customer_billcustitemcode
    ,bcr.servicetypeflag as lms_customer_billcustservicetypeflag
    ,bcr.returnreverserateflag as lms_customer_billcustreturnreverserateflag
    ,bcr.minnoofpcls as lms_customer_billcustminnoofpcls
    ,bcr.productcategoryid as lms_customer_billcustproductcategoryid
    ,bcr.samedayconsolidation as lms_customer_billcustsamedayconsolidation
    ,bcr.rategroupid as lms_customer_billcustrategroupid
    ,bcr.risksurchargeflag as lms_customer_billcustrisksurchargeflag
    ,bcr.applyavgvolweight as lms_customer_billcustapplyavgvolweight
    ,bcr.avgvolweight as lms_customer_billcustavgvolweight
    ,bcr.ecommcustomerflag as lms_customer_billcustecommcustomerflag
    ,bcr.leadtimestructureid as lms_customer_billcustleadtimestructureid
    ,bcr.recalcinprogress as lms_customer_billcustrecalcinprogress
    ,bcr.recalcuserid as lms_customer_billcustrecalcuserid
    ,bcr.needwebhook as lms_customer_billcustneedwebhook
    ,bcr.routemaint as lms_customer_billcustroutemaint
    ,bcr.lhdistrflag as lms_customer_billcustlhdistrflag
    ,bcg.id as lms_customer_billcustgroupid
    ,bcg.description as lms_customer_billcustgroupdescription
    ,bcg.grouptypeid as lms_customer_billcustgroupgrouptypeid
    ,bcgt.id as lms_customer_billcustgrouptypeid
    ,bcgt.description as lms_customer_billcustgrouptypedescription


FROM dbocustomer lc
LEFT JOIN publiccustomer oc on oc.lmsid = lc.id
LEFT JOIN dbobillbillcustomersr bcr on bcr.billcustid = lc.id 
LEFT JOIN dbobillcustomergroups bcg  on bcg.id = bcr.custgroupid
LEFT JOIN dbobillcustomergrouptypes bcgt on bcgt.id = bcg.grouptypeid

WHERE isbillto <> 1

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stzone 
AS
SELECT 
    z.Id as lms_zone_id
    ,z.Code as lms_zone_code
    ,z.Description as lms_zone_description
    ,z.ISOCode as lms_zone_isocode
    ,z.LocID as lms_zone_locid
    ,z.ZoneMasterID as lms_zone_zonemasterid
FROM dbozone z

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stsroute 
AS
SELECT 
    sr.ID as lms_sroute_id
    ,sr.BillCustID as lms_sroute_billcustid
    ,sr.CourierID as lms_sroute_courierid
    ,sr.Description as lms_sroute_description
    ,sr.Code as lms_sroute_code
    ,sr.id2 as lms_sroute_id2
    ,sr.SRouteGroupID as lms_sroute_sroutegroupid
    ,sr.ZoneID as lms_sroute_zoneid
    ,sr.broutemasterID as lms_sroute_broutemasterid
    ,sr.LocalFlag as lms_sroute_localflag
    ,sr.Area as lms_sroute_area
    ,sr.HighVolume as lms_sroute_highvolume
FROM dbosroute sr

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stbillzoneroute 
AS
SELECT 
    bzr.ID as lms_billzoneroute_id
    ,bzr.Description as lms_billzoneroute_description
    ,bzr.ZoneID as lms_billzoneroute_zoneid
    ,bzr.ZRSCode as lms_billzoneroute_zrscode
    ,bzr.ZoneRouteOrder as lms_billzoneroute_zonerouteorder
    ,bzr.ZoneType as lms_billzoneroute_zonetype
    ,bzr.BRouteMasterID as lms_billzoneroute_broutemasterid
    ,bzr.BrouteCode as lms_billzoneroute_broutecode

FROM dbobillzoneroute bzr

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stbillzone 
AS
SELECT 
    bz.ID as lms_customer_id
    ,bz.Description as lms_billzone_description
    ,bz.ZoneMasterID as lms_billzone_zonemasterid
    ,bz.CountryID as lms_billzone_countryid
FROM dbobillzone bz

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stlocation 
AS
SELECT 
    l.id as lms_location_id
    ,l.description as lms_location_description
    ,l.code as lms_location_code
    ,l.collect as lms_location_collect
    ,l.pcode as lms_location_pcode
    ,l.custid as lms_location_custid
    ,l.retail as lms_location_retail
    ,l.scale as lms_location_scale
    ,l.custcode as lms_location_custcode
    ,l.captureonly as lms_location_captureonly
    ,l.zoneid as lms_location_zoneid
    ,l.scantype as lms_location_scantype
    ,l.billcustid as lms_location_billcustid
    ,l.latitude as lms_location_latitude
    ,l.longitude as lms_location_longitude
    ,l.holdlocid as lms_location_holdlocid
    ,l.branchmanageruserid as lms_location_branchmanageruserid
    ,l.fwcostcentre as lms_location_fwcostcentre
    ,l.fwuserid as lms_location_fwuserid
    ,l.fwmultibusinessid as lms_location_fwmultibusinessid
    ,l.glcode as lms_location_glcode
    ,l.hubcode as lms_location_hubcode
    ,l.fwapikey as lms_location_fwapikey
    ,l.geolocationgroupid as lms_location_geolocationgroupid
    ,l.geolocationflag as lms_location_geolocationflag
    ,l.orvactive as lms_location_orvactive
    ,l.cref as lms_location_cref
    ,l.tempcol as lms_location_tempcol
    ,l.holdlocparentlocid as lms_location_holdlocparentlocid
    ,l.floorsize as lms_location_floorsize
    ,l.isstationidenabled as lms_location_isstationidenabled
    ,l.activeflag as lms_location_activeflag
    ,l.masterlocid as lms_location_masterlocid
    ,l.locationtypeid as lms_location_locationtypeid
    ,l.locationcode as lms_location_locationcode


FROM dbolocation l
